OrgName.entry: HALLAM FM & MAGIC AM CASH FOR KIDS

AltName.entry: HALLAM MONEY MOUNTAIN TRUST; HELP A HALLAM CHILD (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Official registered charity of Hallam FM and Magic AM. Fundraising charity to help children who are in situations of poverty, neglect, abuse or illness. Aims to enhance children's lives by providing equipment and renovating buildings. Help can be given to local organisations and individuals. All money received is given back to communities in South Yorkshire and the North Midlands.
